meta_title: Union Balanced Advantage Fund Direct   Growth - Groww
meta_desc: Union Balanced Advantage Fund Direct   Growth is Dynamic Asset Allocation Hybrid mutual fund with risk-reward rating of 3/10. It has track record of 7 years, with three year return of 11.4. Risk is Very High
scheme_name: Union Balanced Advantage Fund Direct   Growth
exit_load: Exit load of 1%, if redeemed within 15 days.
description: The scheme seeks to achieve long term capital appreciation and generate income through an equity portfolio by using long equities, equity derivatives and arbitrage opportunities available.

analysis.analysis_desc: 5Y annualised returns higher than category average by 0.24%

This fund has holdings of the highest quality

amc_info.name: Union Mutual Fund
amc_info.address: Unit 503, 5th Floor,Leela Business Park, Andheri Kurla Road,Andheri (East) Mumbai 400059
amc_info.description: Union KBC Mutual Fund started their mutual fund on 23/03/2011 and its managing total assets of â‚¹3,811 Cr. Its ranked at 30 as per total assets at end of 30th Sep 2017.
amc_info.more_description:
Union Mutual Fund is sponsored by Union Bank of India and is therefore a trusted brand for investors.

Union Mutual Fund visions to obtain prosperity by responsibly investing in the capital market. Their aim is to provide the right client, the right product at the right time. The asset management company aims at understanding the investor's needs better and customizes products in a way that will be beneficial to them.

It believes in creating an investment platform which is sustainable for the long-term and helps investors to create wealth systematically. The fund house provides various mutual funds across different market capitalization and categories, in order to apppeal to investors with various needs. Union Mutual Fund targets to give its investors a brilliant investing experience and choose mutual fund as an instrument for the long haul.

category_info.category_helper_text: Invests in stocks as per Contrarian investment strategy
category_info.tax_impact: If you redeem within one year, returns are taxed at 20%. If you redeem after one year, returns exceeding Rs 1.25 lakh in a financial year are taxed at 12.5%.
category_info.description: Contra funds follow Contrarian strategy which means investing in stocks in contrast to the prevailing sentiment. Minimum investment in equity is 65%.
